name: Wedia
overview:
Wedia SA provides software solutions for cross-media publishing applications. It offers solutions for the external and internal communications, marketing and sales, and press. The company provides Open4 software suite, an integrated platform for content management and cross-media publishing to manage, repurpose, and promote print, Web, e-paper, or mobile content. Wedia SAâ€™s suite includes NOHETO Open4 Print Publishing Software, a software to organize, automate, and follow print publishing cycle requirements of newspapers, magazines, communications agencies, and marketing/communications departments in various companies; NOHETO Open4 Web Motion Software, an ergonomic software for multi-site, multi-brand, and multilingual Website content management; and NOHETO Open4 Content-to-Commerce Software to manage sites and stimulate online sales. It also provides Time-to-Content quality process, cross-media content management consultation, and Time-to-Run hosting services.

The company was formerly known as DATOX and changed its name to Wedia SA in 2005. Wedia SA was founded in 1981 and is based in Paris, France.
